alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 1:40AM CST until January 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Very cold wind chills as low as 18 below zero. * WHERE...Ottawa and Delaware Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, now until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions from the snow today. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
